lyrics.stanza: Day by day His grace grows dearer; His love has conquered me, Never leaving, never ceasing, His Spirit constantly Flooding me, rich and free; Higher than the highest heaven, He lifts me up to see New Jerusalem descending, His Bride, His love to be Eternally, it shall be.
